remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要 在 Windows 窗体上绘制，应使用其中一种 方法。To draw an on a Windows Form, you should use one of the methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms. 它是事件的处理程序 。It is a handler for the event. 对象将传递给事件，并用于在窗体上绘制图像。A object is passed to the event and is used to draw the image on the form. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 从名为 SampImag.jpg 的文件创建映像。Creates an image from a file named SampImag.jpg. 此文件必须位于与应用程序可执行文件相同的文件夹中。This file must be located in the same folder as the application executable file. - 创建一个点，在该点绘制图像的左上角。Creates a point at which to draw the upper-left corner of the image. - 在窗体上绘制无比例的图像。Draws the unscaled image on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回有关多帧图像的信息，这些图像分为两种样式：多页和多个分辨率。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多页图像是包含多个图像的图像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每个页面都包含单个图像 (或帧) 。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 这些页面 (或图像或帧) 通常会连续显示，以生成一个动画序列，如动态 .gif 文件。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多解析图像是包含不同分辨率的图像的多个副本的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 这通常由 MIP 映射使用，其中显示的图像大小决定了用于绘制的图像的分辨率。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 可以支持任意数量的页面 (或图像，也可以支持帧) ，以及任意数量的分辨率。can support an arbitrary number of pages (or images, or frames), as well as an arbitrary number of resolutions. 定义的维度是的属性 。The defined dimensions are properties of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管 GDI + 具有支持以下文件类型的内置编码器和解码器：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 在释放之前，该文件将保持锁定状态 。The file remains locked until the is disposed. 如果文件没有有效的图像格式，或者如果不 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 支持文件的像素格式，则此方法将引发 异常。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持位图中的 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，请使用每个像素32位的 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到窗体中，并 通过调用 `DemonstratePropertyItem` 方法传递作为来处理窗体的事件 `e` 。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 托管 GDI + 具有支持以下文件类型的内置编码器和解码器：Managed GDI+ has built-in encoders and decoders that support the following file types: - BMPBMP - GIFGIF - JPEGJPEG - PNGPNG - TIFFTIFF 如果文件没有有效的图像格式，或者如果不 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 支持文件的像素格式，则此方法将引发 异常。If the file does not have a valid image format or if [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] does not support the pixel format of the file, this method throws an exception. 在释放之前，该文件将保持锁定状态 。The file remains locked until the is disposed. `useEmbeddedColorManagement`参数指定新 应用的颜色更正是否根据图像文件中嵌入的颜色管理信息而进行。The `useEmbeddedColorManagement` parameter specifies whether the new applies color correction according to color management information that is embedded in the image file. 嵌入的信息可以包括国际颜色协会 (ICC) 配置文件、伽玛值和 chromaticity 信息。Embedded information can include International Color Consortium (ICC) profiles, gamma values, and chromaticity information. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持位图中的 alpha 透明度。The class does not support alpha transparency in bitmaps. 若要启用 alpha 透明度，请使用每个像素32位的 PNG 图像。To enable alpha transparency, use PNG images with 32 bits per pixel. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法获取新位图 。The following code example demonstrates how to obtain a new bitmap using the method. 它还演示了 。It also demonstrates a . 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含名为的按钮的窗体 `Button2` 。Create a form containing a button named `Button2`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将该 `Button2_Click` 方法与按钮的 事件关联。Paste the code into the form and associate the `Button2_Click` method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回有关多帧图像的信息，这些图像分为两种样式：多页和多个分辨率。This method returns information about multiple-frame images, which come in two styles: multiple page and multiple resolution. 多页图像是包含多个图像的图像。A multiple-page image is an image that contains more than one image. 每个页面都包含单个图像 (或帧) 。Each page contains a single image (or frame). 这些页面 (或图像或帧) 通常会连续显示，以生成一个动画序列，如动态 .gif 文件。These pages (or images, or frames) are typically displayed in succession to produce an animated sequence, such as an animated .gif file. 多解析图像是包含不同分辨率的图像的多个副本的映像。A multiple-resolution image is an image that contains more than one copy of an image at different resolutions. 这通常由 MIP 映射使用，其中显示的图像大小决定了用于绘制的图像的分辨率。This is commonly used by MIP mapping where the displayed image size determines the resolution of the image used for drawing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法顺时针旋转图像。The method rotates the image clockwise. 如果希望在图像旋转后绘制图像，应始终从图像中检索新的图形对象，否则可能会出现异常。If you wish to draw on an image once it has been rotated, you should always retrieve a new graphics object from the image, otherwise an exception could occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何对 和枚举调用方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method on an and the enumeration. 此示例旨在与包含名为的和名为的按钮的 Windows 窗体一起使用 `PictureBox1` `Button1` 。This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form that contains a named `PictureBox1` and a button named `Button1`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中， `InitializeBitmap` 从窗体的构造函数调用，并 `Button1_Click` 与按钮的 事件关联。Paste the code into a form, call `InitializeBitmap` from the form's constructor, and associate `Button1_Click` with the button's event. 确保位图的文件路径在系统中有效。Ensure the file path to the bitmap is valid on your system. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像的文件格式不存在编码器，则使用便携式网络图形 (PNG) 编码器。If no encoder exists for the file format of the image, the Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoder is used. 使用 方法将图形图像另存为 Windows 图元文件格式 (WMF) 或增强型图元文件格式 (EMF) 文件，生成的文件将另存为可移植网络图形 (PNG) 文件。When you use the method to save a graphic image as a Windows Metafile Format (WMF) or Enhanced Metafile Format (EMF) file, the resulting file is saved as a Portable Network Graphics (PNG) file. 之所以发生此行为，是因为 [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] 的组件没有 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 可用于将文件另存为 .wmf 或 .emf 文件的编码器。This behavior occurs because the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] component of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] does not have an encoder that you can use to save files as .wmf or .emf files. 不允许将图像保存到从中构建它的文件，并且会引发异常。Saving the image to the same file it was constructed from is not allowed and throws an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 创建一个包含名为的按钮的窗体 `Button5` 。Create a form that contains a button named `Button5`. 将代码粘贴到窗体中，并将该方法与按钮的 事件关联。Paste the code into the form, and associate the method with the button's event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数的可能值 `dimensionID` 是的属性 。The possible values of the `dimensionID` parameter are properties of the . 这些值可用于通过其时间、分辨率或页码标识映像。These can be used to identify an image by its time, resolution, or page number. 调用此方法会导致放弃对前一帧所做的所有更改。Calling this method causes all changes made to the previous frame to be discarded. 选择另一个帧之前，保存对当前帧所做的所有更改，包括对像素值和属性的更改。Before selecting another frame, save all changes made to the current frame, including changes to pixel values and properties. 如果对方法的调用 成功 (则) 不发生异常，则该方法将返回0。If the call to the method is successful (an exception does not occur), the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果图像格式不支持属性项，则此方法将引发 并且出现消息 "不支持属性"。If the image format does not support property items, this method throws with the message "Property not supported." 如果图像格式支持属性项，但不支持您尝试设置的特定属性，则此方法将忽略此尝试，但不会引发异常。If the image format supports property items but does not support the particular property you are attempting to set, this method ignores the attempt but does not throw an exception. 由于 类没有公共构造函数，因此很难设置属性项。It is difficult to set property items, because the class has no public constructors. 解决此限制的一种方法是 通过检索 属性值或调用 已有属性项的的方法获取。One way to work around this restriction is to obtain a by retrieving the property value or calling the method of an that already has property items. 然后，可以设置的字段并将 其传递给 。Then you can set the fields of the and pass it to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and methods. 此示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴到窗体中，并 通过调用 `DemonstratePropertyItem` 方法传递作为来处理窗体的事件 `e` 。To run this example, paste it into a form, and handle the form's event by calling the `DemonstratePropertyItem` method, passing `e` as .
